name: BorgWarner Inc.
description: BorgWarner Inc. is a global leader in propulsion systems for combustion, hybrid, and electric vehicles. Founded in 1928, the company has a long history of innovation and engineering excellence in the automotive industry. BorgWarner specializes in developing advanced technologies that improve vehicle performance, fuel efficiency, and emissions control. Their product offerings include turbochargers, transmission components, and electric drives, as well as thermal management solutions. With a strong commitment to sustainability, BorgWarner is focused on the future of mobility, offering solutions that support the transition to electrified vehicles and contribute to a cleaner environment. The company operates in more than 60 locations across 18 countries, serving a diverse customer base that includes major automotive manufacturers worldwide. BorgWarner's mission is to create a cleaner, more energy-efficient world by delivering high-quality products and innovative solutions that enhance performance and sustainability in the automotive sector. The company's strategic investments in electrification and hybrid technology position it well to meet the evolving demands of the automotive market and contribute to a sustainable future.
